sorters.abstractsorters

Class MergeSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorters.abstractsorters.AbstractSorter
      • sorters.abstractsorters.MergeSorter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MergeArraysSort, MergeBubbleDown, MergeBubbleUp, MergeQuickSort

    public abstract class MergeSorter
extends AbstractSorter
    Author:
    Burba

    Used by merge sorts to merge two sorted parts.

      • mergeArrays

        public void mergeArrays(int[] leftArray,
                        int[] rightArray,
                        int leftLength,
                        int rightLength,
                        int[] mergedArray)
        Merges two arrays into one.
        Parameters:
        leftArray - first array.
        rightArray - second array.
        leftLength - size of the first array.
        rightLength - size of the second array.
        mergedArray - array into which the result of merge is written.
